resources.string: XML Translator Free could not establish a internet connection. Make sure you are connected to a network and try again.
This translation will exceed your 3000 character daily limit.
Please mount writable external storage media in order to use this app.
Read external permission necessary to read application files.
Write external permission necessary to write to application files.
Read External Storage permission allows this app to read important app data. Please allow this permission in App Settings.
Write External Storage permission allows this app to store important app data. Please allow this permission in App Settings.
Please select a different xml file.
Please enter text in XML format.
Depending on the amount of translations, this process could consume a large amount of mobile data.
Therefore, it is advised that you acquire an unlimited or unmetered network connection before beginning your translation.
